rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with built-in storage and a small reception area. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the door for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with a Scandinavian minimalist design, featuring a modular sofa and natural light from large windows positioned in the east for optimal morning sunlight. Vastu alignment ensures energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area with a functional layout, Scandinavian style cabinetry, and an island worktop. Windows on the north side promote ventilation.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet reading nook with built-in bookshelves, warm lighting, and a cozy seating area. Vastu principles suggest placing it in the northeast for knowledge and learning.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom with Scandinavian fixtures, ample storage, and natural light from frosted windows.

openings.description: Large entrance door with glass panels to maximize natural light, following Vastu guidelines.
Smaller opening providing access to the rooftop terrace for additional outdoor space and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed with Scandinavian minimalism, featuring ample natural light through east-facing windows and a private ensuite bathroom. Vastu principles dictate the placement of the bed in the south-west corner.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom with minimalist Scandinavian decor, natural light from north-facing windows, and built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom designed for flexibility, featuring a Scandinavian aesthetic with natural light from south-facing windows. Adheres to Vastu by placing the bed in an auspicious direction.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for the three bedrooms, designed with Scandinavian fixtures and natural light from frosted windows.

openings.description: Balcony adjacent to the master bedroom offering private outdoor space and enhanced ventilation.
Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, designed for safety and aesthetic appeal.
Stairway leading to the rooftop terrace providing access while maintaining privacy and security.

features.name: Rooftop Terrace
features.description: Expansive outdoor space designed for relaxation, dining, or yoga. Features Scandinavian minimalist landscaping, built-in seating, pergola for shade, and large open windows on the building to enhance ventilation.

additional_details.vastu_considerations: Ensures proper alignment of entrances, placement of key elements such as library in the northeast and bedrooms oriented according to auspicious directions.
additional_details.split_level_description: A split-level design offering distinct living areas across different floors with seamless transitions via interior staircases and openings.
